message:
Iori joined us. :P

(Please don't kill me)
I'm busy trying to sort out my cellphone callforwarding problem.
Thanks Buffel, you're a scholar and gentleman.

Iori, how dare you!

I take offense to being called a gentleman.
My Work life is currently keeping me busy atm... Pop in from time to time, but not much chance to post.
I'm at home these last two days, playing games and watching movies.
I guess we had a lot of E3 buzz. It's a VERY quiet couple of months.
I'm actually PLAYING some games for a change. :)
I'm just going through a 'meh, I don't feel like chatting phase'... No, sorry, since Iori joined I've moved on (wow, this is fun!)
My excuse is that I had a really weird week, followed by a 16-hour flight (with no internet), after which I disembarked and went straight to a funeral. LET'S SEE YOU TOP THAT.

I'm at work on a Sunday.

Let's see you top that.
Hanging around here sure makes me feel good about my current situation. ;)
